name: Elevángel
description:
[Notes: 

Important! Bug:  Make sure that before you go to meet your father, you go to -5 with Ángel.  Trust us! This way he will reveal his last secret... 

Also: The final scene when winning the game is missing the dialog. This will be added in a post-jam build. We hope the resolution still feels epic!]

Being a basement elevator is so lonely. Specially since your dad was retired... you saw him go to the upper floors, but you can't get there!

Suddenly a weird-looking mechanic called Ángel walks into you, adjusts a few screws, and tells you you are ready for real grown-up elevator work! And he may even be able to reunite you with your father... but not until you've finished carrying passengers to their destinations!

Controls:

UP/DOWN to move the elevator

LEFT/RIGHT to pick up or drop passengers

SPACE to brake

Creators:

Art by RudeEtude, Wanderix

Code by Kotzi, Mr. Moe, CubicoBlanco

Music and Sound Effects by RedCalcifer
